revised_title: Elliptic Solutions and Quasi-Periodic Wave Solutions of Coupled Nonlinear Schrödinger Equations
tldr: The authors study the coupled nonlinear Schrödinger equations, which model single-mode fibers in fiber optics. They find elliptic solutions and quasi-periodic wave solutions using a Lax representation and theta functions. The research focuses on the integrable case of the 1:2:1 potential and the two-gap Treibich-Verdier potentials.
